properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 10:57AM MST until January 13 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Periods of heavy snow with lulls of much lighter snow or
no snow at all at times through Monday evening. Snowfall rates
will also vary through the period. Total snow accumulations of
12 to 18 inches with locally higher amounts expected. Winds
gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains.

* WHEN...From noon today to 8 PM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult to impossible with blowing
snow significantly reducing visibility at times. A detailed
map of the snowfall can be found at:
www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST MONDAY
